screenWidth.description: The screen width on the device

screenHeight.description: The screen height on the device

availableScreenWidth.description: The available screen width on the device

availableScreenHeight.description: The available screen height on the device

renderWidth.description: The available width to render content in the browser

renderHeight.description: The available height to render content in the browser

browserWidth.description: The browsers width including its chrome

browserHeight.description: The browsers height including its chrome

devicePixelRatio.description: The device pixle ratio for the display, this is the ratio between physical pixels and device-independent pixels (dips) on the device. (physical pixels / dips)
